title: Is the BlackBerry APN still a thing? Is it still around? - Quora

response.answer_text: Title kinda says it all, someone says, I was getting nostalgic after cleaning and running across and old “BlackBerry” I remember how awesome the “BlackBerry” APN was, being able to roam cheap unlimited anywhere it was supported pretty much. Thanks you.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Aditya Kumar Saxena
